function.description: Calculate area and volume of common geometric shapes given their dimensions and shape type.
function.name: calculate_area_and_volume_of_shapes

dimensions.description: The dimensions of the shape that are necessary to calculate its area and volume.

function.description: Calculates the area of a circle given its radius.
function.name: calculate_area_of_circle

function.description: Calculates the volume of a cone given its radius and height.
function.name: calculate_volume_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a cube given its side length.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cube

side_length.description: The length of one side of the cube.
